introText: The Board of Internal Economy oversees the Legislative Assembly of Ontario and independent officers, ensuring transparent and accountable parliamentary operations.
descriptionText: The Board of Internal Economy spent $299M in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 0.1% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports legislative operations and independent oversight.
roleText: Democratic governance requires transparent and independent oversight. The Board supports the Legislative Assembly, the Auditor General, Ombudsman, and other independent officers who ensure government accountability.
programsDescription: The Board of Internal Economy supports the Office of the Assembly, Auditor General, Ombudsman, Chief Electoral Officer, and other independent officers that ensure democratic accountability and transparency.
